00051 void Terme_Boussinesq_VDF_Face::associer_zones(const Zone_dis& zone_dis,
00052                                                const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_Cl_dis)
00053 {
00054   la_zone_VDF = ref_cast(Zone_VDF, zone_dis.valeur());
00055   la_zone_Cl_VDF = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VDF, zone_Cl_dis.valeur());
00056 }
00057 
00058 DoubleTab& Terme_Boussinesq_VDF_Face::ajouter(DoubleTab& resu) const
00059 {
00060   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = la_zone_VDF.valeur();
00061   const Zone_Cl_VDF& zone_Cl_VDF_hyd = la_zone_Cl_VDF.valeur();
00062   const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_Cl_scal = equation_scalaire().zone_Cl_dis();
00063   const Zone_Cl_VDF& zone_Cl_VDF_scal = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VDF,zone_Cl_scal.valeur());
00064   const DoubleTab& param = equation_scalaire().inconnue().valeurs();
00065   const DoubleTab& beta_valeurs = beta().valeur().valeurs();
00066   const DoubleVect& grav = gravite().valeurs();
00067   const IntTab& face_voisins = zone_VDF.face_voisins();
00068   const IntVect& orientation = zone_VDF.orientation();
00069   const DoubleTab& xv = zone_VDF.xv();
00070   const DoubleVect& porosite_surf = zone_VDF.porosite_face();
00071   const DoubleVect& volumes_entrelaces = zone_VDF.volumes_entrelaces();
00072   const DoubleTab& vitesse = equation().inconnue().valeurs();
00073 
00074   DoubleVect g(dimension);
00075   g = grav;
00076 
00077   int nb_dim = param.line_size();
00078 
00079 // Verifie la validite de T0:
00080   check();
00081 
00082 // Boucle sur les conditions limites pour traiter les faces de bord
00083   for (int n_bord=0; n_bord<zone_VDF.nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
00084     {
00085 // pour chaque Condition Limite on regarde son type
00086       const Cond_lim& la_cl = zone_Cl_VDF_hyd.les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00087       const Cond_lim& la_cl_scal = zone_Cl_VDF_scal.les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00088       const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
00089       int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00090       int nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
00091 
00092       if (sub_type(Neumann_sortie_libre,la_cl.valeur()))
00093         {
00094           if (sub_type(Neumann_sortie_libre,la_cl_scal.valeur()))
00095             {
00096               const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl_neumann_scal = ref_cast(Neumann_sortie_libre, la_cl_scal.valeur());
00097               for (int num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
00098                 {
00099                   int outlet;
00100                   int elem = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00101                   if (elem==-1)
00102                     {
00103                       outlet = (vitesse(num_face)<0?1:0);
00104                       elem = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00105                     }
00106                   else
00107                     outlet = (vitesse(num_face)>0?1:0);
00108                   double coef=0;
00109                   for (int dim=0; dim<nb_dim; dim++)
00110                     {
00111                       double param_face = (outlet ? valeur(param,elem,dim) : 0.5*(valeur(param,elem,dim)+la_cl_neumann_scal.val_ext(num_face-ndeb,dim)));
00112                       coef += valeur(beta_valeurs,elem,elem,dim)*(Scalaire0(dim)-param_face);
00113                     }
00114 
00115                   if (axi)
00116                     {
00117                       double cos_teta = cos(xv(num_face,1));
00118                       double sin_teta = sin(xv(num_face,1));
00119                       g(0) = grav(0)*cos_teta + grav(1)*sin_teta;
00120                       g(1) = grav(1)*cos_teta - grav(0)*sin_teta;
00121                     }
00122                   double vol = volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
00123                   int ncomp = orientation(num_face);
00124                   resu(num_face)+= coef*g(ncomp)*vol;
00125                 }
00126             }
00127           else if (sub_type(Dirichlet,la_cl_scal.valeur()))
00128             {
00129               const Dirichlet& la_cl_diri_scal = ref_cast(Dirichlet,la_cl_scal.valeur());
00130               for (int num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
00131                 {
00132                   int outlet;
00133                   int elem = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00134                   if (elem==-1)
00135                     {
00136                       outlet = (vitesse(num_face)<0?1:0);
00137                       elem = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00138                     }
00139                   else
00140                     outlet = (vitesse(num_face)>0?1:0);
00141 
00142                   double coef=0;
00143                   for (int dim=0; dim<nb_dim; dim++)
00144                     {
00145                       double param_face = (outlet ? valeur(param,elem,dim) : 0.5*(valeur(param,elem,dim)+la_cl_diri_scal.val_imp(num_face-ndeb,dim)));
00146                       coef += valeur(beta_valeurs,elem,elem,dim)*(Scalaire0(dim)-param_face);
00147                     }
00148                   if (axi)
00149                     {
00150                       double cos_teta = cos(xv(num_face,1));
00151                       double sin_teta = sin(xv(num_face,1));
00152                       g(0) = grav(0)*cos_teta + grav(1)*sin_teta;
00153                       g(1) = grav(1)*cos_teta - grav(0)*sin_teta;
00154                     }
00155                   double vol = volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
00156                   int ncomp = orientation(num_face);
00157                   resu(num_face)+= coef*g(ncomp)*vol;
00158                 }
00159             }
00160         }
00161       else
00162         {
00163           for (int num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
00164             {
00165               int elem = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00166               if (elem == -1) elem = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00167               double coef = 0;
00168               for (int dim=0; dim<nb_dim; dim++)
00169                 {
00170                   double param_face = valeur(param,elem,dim);
00171                   coef += valeur(beta_valeurs,elem,elem,dim)*(Scalaire0(dim)-param_face);
00172                 }
00173               if (axi)
00174                 {
00175                   double cos_teta = cos(xv(num_face,1));
00176                   double sin_teta = sin(xv(num_face,1));
00177                   g(0) = grav(0)*cos_teta + grav(1)*sin_teta;
00178                   g(1) = grav(1)*cos_teta - grav(0)*sin_teta;
00179                 }
00180               int ncomp = orientation(num_face);
00181               double vol = volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
00182               resu(num_face) += coef*g(ncomp)*vol;
00183             }
00184         }
00185     }
00186 
00187 // Boucle sur les faces internes
00188   int ndeb = zone_VDF.premiere_face_int();
00189   int nb_faces = zone_VDF.nb_faces();
00190   for (int num_face=ndeb; num_face<nb_faces; num_face++)
00191     {
00192       int elem1 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
00193       int elem2 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
00194       double coef = 0;
00195       for (int dim=0; dim<nb_dim; dim++)
00196         {
00197           double param_face = 0.5*(valeur(param,elem1,dim)+valeur(param,elem2,dim));
00198           coef += valeur(beta_valeurs,elem1,elem2,dim)*(Scalaire0(dim)-param_face);
00199         }
00200       if (axi)
00201         {
00202           double cos_teta = cos(xv(num_face,1));
00203           double sin_teta = sin(xv(num_face,1));
00204           g(0) = grav(0)*cos_teta + grav(1)*sin_teta;
00205           g(1) = grav(1)*cos_teta - grav(0)*sin_teta;
00206         }
00207       int ncomp = orientation(num_face);
00208       double vol = volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
00209       resu(num_face) += coef*g(ncomp)*vol;
00210     }
00211   return resu;
00212 }
